mapper.sql: pk_id, account, password, name, avatar, state,publish,buy, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (pk_id, account, password, name, avatar, state, publish,buy, create_time) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publish,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_user
pk_id,
account,
password,
name,

state,
publish,
buy,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update t_user
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
publish = #{publish,jdbcType=INTEGER},
buy = #{buy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where pk_id = #{pkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publish = #{publish,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buy = #{buy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where pk_id = #{pkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select COUNT(1) from t_user WHERE 1 = 1
AND state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}
